1.title: Coast to Coast: Part 1
1.plot: Join life-long eclipse hunters for a unique guided tour along the path of totality; showcasing the best viewing spots for the eclipse from central Oregon to the banks of the Mississippi River. Along the way, see how small towns and communities in the path are preparing for this thrilling event.

2.title: Coast to Coast: Part 2
2.plot: The eclipse journey continues from St. Louis' Gateway Arch to the coast of South Carolina, where the path of totality leaves the continental U.S. A top data scientists from NASA explains how the strange geometry of the moon's shadow helps pinpoint the exact path and what viewers can expect to see.

3.title: Eclipse Planet
3.plot: Earth is the vantage point from which to see the grandest eclipses in our solar system, and during an eclipse we get a glimpse of the sun's mysterious corona. Learn the science behind eclipses, and how scientists are using them to discover new exoplanets.

4.title: Witnessing the Eclipse
4.plot: Millions of cameras will be rolling on August 21st , But capturing the stunning celestial phenomenon takes a combination of technology, experience and a healthy dose of luck. Learn the incredible lengths scientists and others will go to record the event - and how to best witness it yourself.

imdb.plot outline: This spectacular celestial event has been nearly 100 years in the making. On August 21st, 2017, as the Earth, Moon and Sun align in dramatic fashion, a total solar eclipse will blaze a brilliant path of darkness across the continental United States. In this 4-part CuriosityStream Original series, get the exclusive advance look as we follow an international group of scientists, adventurers and eclipse chasers preparing to experience the thrilling Eclipse Across America. With cutting edge special effects animations, discover secret viewing spots, explore the science behind eclipses, and see the high stakes effort to capture the historic event like never before.
imdb.title: Eclipse Across America
plot: This 4-part series teaches viewers about the historic 2017 total solar eclipse that will occur across a large part of the United States in August 2017.::CuriosityStream
